forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low around 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Periods of rain. Low -1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Occasional rain. Low 33F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High around 40F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow diminishing in the evening. Partial clearing late. Low near -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. Then becoming partly cloudy late. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of wintry precipitation in the morning. Then mainly rain showers expected in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix in the morning will transition to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain in the evening will give way to snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early transitioning to snow showers late. Low near 30F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early changing to a few snow showers late. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to a few snow showers late. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 33F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low 31F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
